programme.title: MST3K: The Giant Spider Invasion
programme.desc: Mike and the 'bots suffer through The Giant Spider Invasion (1975).

programme.title: MST3K: Girl In Gold Boots
programme.desc: Mike and the bots put Girl In Gold Boots in their crosshairs and take it down.

programme.title: MST3K: The Crawling Hand
programme.desc: The hand of an exploded astronaut takes on a life of its own in this sci-fi thriller.

programme.title: MST3K: Escape 2000
programme.desc: A grunge punk fights an evil corporation enforcing an evacuation of the Bronx in Escape from the Bronx (1983).

programme.title: MST3K: Catalina Caper
programme.desc: Two college boys enjoy Catalina Island sunshine, while another boy's parents scheme to sell a stolen scroll.

programme.title: MST3K: War Of The Colossal Beast
programme.desc: Disfigured "Colossal Man" Glen is spotted in Mexico and his sister tries to save him.

programme.title: MST3K: Invasion U.S.A.
programme.desc: A group of barflies must figure out what to do when the Soviets attack the U.S. in Invasion USA (1952).

programme.title: MST3K: Project Moonbase
programme.desc: Joel and the Bots watch two more Commando Cody episodes and a film about a sabotaged space station.

programme.title: Cinematic Titanic: Legacy Of Blood
programme.desc: One by one, children and servants start turning up dead at the family estate.

programme.title: MST3K: Invasion Of The Neptune Man
programme.desc: Our heroes discover how boring an alien attack on Tokyo can be when they view an anti-vehicle for Sonny Chiba.

programme.title: MST3K: Danger!! Death Ray
programme.desc: Secret Agent Bart Fargo chases the kidnappers of the inventor of a death ray.

programme.title: The Film Crew: Killers From Space
programme.desc: Former Mystery Science Theater 3000 crew rip apart Killers from Space.

programme.title: MST3K: Village Of The Giants
programme.desc: A child genius creates a growth formula that ends up in the hands of some incredibly annoying teenagers.
